definition: excess bodily weight, to cry or whine with snuffling
details:
noun
- excess bodily weight
= synonyms: fat
- an insulating layer of fat under the skin of whales and other large marine mammals
verb
- to cry or whine with snuffling
= example: to cry or whine with snuffling
= synonyms: snuffle
- to utter while crying
= example: to utter while crying
= synonyms: blubber out
